name: Passing By (ibex)
description:
Manipulate gravity and collect objects of power in this short non linear rage-game.

Features:

  • Physics based movement and gravity manipulation
  • Simple control scheme using only left/right click and mouse movement
  • Dynamic original music
  • Timer for speedrunning

Controls:

  • change gravity: Left Click & Drag
  • shrink gravity range: Hold Right Click
  • pause: Escape

notes:

  • If you have an old or integrated video card you can turn of the paint effect in the options menu
  • Part of a project to release 2 games a month in 2023.

Play though the whole game for free and only buy it if you really like it.
